page.title: 08RESIDENTS ASSOCIATION
page.content: HINDHEAD RESIDENTS ASSOCIATION HAS BEEN IN EXISTENCE FOR EIGHTEEN YEARS AND IT IS A VERY IMPORTANT LOCAL POLITICAL COMMITTTEE BECAUSE PEOPLE CAN DEBATE ABOUT THINGS HAPPENING IN THE AREA IN WHICH THEY LIVE. THE AIM OF THE ASSOCIATION IS TO REPRESENT THE VIEWS OF THE LOCAL RESIDENTS. TO BECOME A MEMBER OF THE ASSOCIATION YOU HAVE TO PAY A SUBSCRIPTION OF Â£I EACH YEAR. THE ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING IS HELD EACH YEAR IN NOVEMBER, AND THE SECRETARY AND OTHER MEMBERS OF THE COMMITTEE MEET EVERY TWO MONTHS. AT THE MOMENT ONE OF THE MAIN ISSUES UNDER DEBATE IS THE SELLING OF LAND TO BUILDERS FOR HOUSING DEVELOPMENTS, SINCE SUCH DEVELOPMENTS AMOUNT TO 'INFILLING'. RESIDENTS WHO OPPOSE SUCH PLANS ARE ABLE TO GO TO THE RESIDENTS ASSOCIATION FOR SUPPORT.
